episodes.title: The Children’s Pastor: The 40-year mission to stop a preacher accused of raping children
episodes.description:
NBC News follows a group of women who allege they were sexually abused by their former pastor as children. Now, decades later, they’ve reunited and found the courage to speak out, determined to stop the alleged predator from harming others.

For more context and news coverage of the most important stories of our day, click here: https://www.nbcnews.com

episodes.title: Lori Vallow on trial for fourth husband's murder
episodes.description:
Another trial is underway for convicted murderer Lori Vallow Daybell, who is already serving life in prison over the killing of her two kids and her fifth husband's previous wife in Idaho. She is back in court over the death of her fourth husband. NBC News' Morgan Chesky is following the trial as Lori Vallow Daybell now represents herself.  For more context and news coverage of the most important stories of our day, click here: https://www.nbcnews.com

episodes.title: Dateline’s Keith Morrison one-one-one with convicted murderer Lori Vallow Daybell
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow sits down with Dateline NBC’s Keith Morrison for her first television interview. Vallow was sentenced to life in prison for murdering her two children, Tylee and JJ. She has also pleaded not guilty to the murder of her fourth husband and is representing herself in that case.

For more context and news coverage of the most important stories of our day, click here: https://www.nbcnews.com

episodes.title: Alleged leader of cultlike group 'Zizians' is arrested in Maryland
episodes.description:
NBC News' David Noriega has the latest on the investigation of the alleged leader of a cultlike group known as the "Zizians." The group been linked to multiple killings, including the fatal shooting of a border patrol officer in Vermont. 
 For more context and news coverage of the most important stories of our day, click here: https://www.nbcnews.com

episodes.title: 'I've been quiet long enough': Woman accusing Jay-Z of sexual assault speaks out
episodes.description:
The woman who is accusing Jay-Z and Sean "Diddy" Combs of sexually assaulting her sat down with NBC News' Chloe Melas in an exclusive interview to talk about her lawsuit. She and her lawyers also acknowledge that there were some inconsistencies in her account in response to questions from NBC News.

episodes.title: Kenyan pastor accused of cult that lures hundreds to their death
episodes.description:
Dozens of accused doomsday cult members in Kenya are facing charges of murder and child torture for luring people to their death for the promise of eternal life. The charges are the start of a legal process centered around the cult's leader who is a self-described pastor.

episodes.title: NXIVM Sex Cult Leader Keith Raniere Found Guilty On All Charges | NBC News Now
episodes.description:
Keith Raniere, sex cult co-founder of a sex cult known as NXIVM (pronounced "nexium") was found guilty of multiple charges including sex trafficking, conspiracy, racketeering, and possession of child pornography. NBC’s Tom Winter breaks down the details in the case.
